purpose: Linux-style manual system for CAI commands with comprehensive documentation access
description: Comprehensive manual system providing detailed documentation for all CAI commands, similar to Linux man pages. Offers structured access to command documentation with search, filtering, and example capabilities. Enables users to access complete documentation that has been extracted from command files for cleaner, more maintainable command structure.

--flags.description: Show only flags and arguments for the specified command
--flags.details: Displays command-line options, arguments, and flag descriptions

--arguments.description: Show only arguments section for the specified command
--arguments.details: Displays positional arguments and their descriptions

--search.description: Search across all command documentation for keywords
--search.details: Searches command descriptions, examples, and documentation for matching terms

--list.details: Shows command catalog with categories and brief descriptions
